title: Driver licenses; eighth grade reading level for minors to obtain a driver license; remedial reading for driver licenses; alternative reading proficiency tests; motorcycle licenses; testing sites requirements; documentation requirements; out-of-state test results; requirement for school enrollment, completion, or lawful excuse for minors to obtain a driver license; violations; alternate route to obtain driver license for certain employed persons under eighteen; employer fines for falsification; attendance officers; Department of Public Safety; license cancellation; definitions; exceptions; forms; effective date; emergency.
